name: Benson, Sheriff, Appellant, v. Bradford County et al.

judges: Before Kephart, C. J., Schaefer, Maxey, Drew, Linn, Stern and Barnes, JJ.
parties: Benson, Sheriff, Appellant, v. Bradford County et al.

opinions.text:
Per Curiam,
Judgment is affirmed on the opinion of Judge Baldrige, reported in 125 Pa. Superior Ct. 209.
opinions.author: Per Curiam,

attorneys: Claude L. Roth, with him William M. Rosenfield, William P. Wilson and J. Roy Lilley, for appellant.
Wm. C. Schrier, County Solicitor, for appellees.
casebody.head_matter:
Benson, Sheriff, Appellant, v. Bradford County et al.
Argued May 18,1937.
Before Kephart, C. J., Schaefer, Maxey, Drew, Linn, Stern and Barnes, JJ.
Claude L. Roth, with him William M. Rosenfield, William P. Wilson and J. Roy Lilley, for appellant.
Wm. C. Schrier, County Solicitor, for appellees.
June 25, 1937:
